author: Travis Clark
title: Disney Plus and Hulu seem to be getting the biggest subscriber bumps among streaming TV services as consumers stay at home
description: TV analytics company EDO surveyed 6,809 people in the US about their at-home viewing habits. A fifth of respondents said they have subscribed to a new streaming service since the coronavirus outbreak began. Disney Plus and Hulu were the streaming services tha…
content:
As movie theaters shut down and people across the US adhere to national guidelines to stay home amid the coronavirus pandemic, at-home movie and TV watching has increased.
The TV analytics company EDO surveyed 6,809 people in the US from March 24 to March 28… [+1432 chars]
